definition: to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
river in Hebei
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
variant of 蒞|莅[li4], to attend
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
(of a notable person etc) to honor with one's presence and offer guidance (idiom)

sentences.english: The outbuildings are a must during your visit.
sentences.chinese: 室外是一个必需在您的莅临。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Dongtang, the chairman, cordial welcome personalities from all walks of life to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 董事长杨东堂先生诚挚欢迎各界人士莅临导。

sentences.english: Everyone is welcomed to feel the passion given by this group of young students adoring the traditional Chinese music.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位莅临，来感受这群年轻学子热爱国乐的热情。

sentences.english: Good evening and a big welcome to this special and  festive gathering.
sentences.chinese: 大家晚上好，欢迎各位莅临今晚盛会。

sentences.english: Welcome to the International Southern Great Wall Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎阁下莅临铜仁南长城国际大酒店。

sentences.english: Welcome to HongKong, a peerless city in entire world.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎莅临香港，一个举世无双的城市。

sentences.english: Welcome to the HJ International Hotel Dongguan, to experience your delightful journey!
sentences.chinese: 莅临东莞厚街国际大酒店，开启全新活力体验之旅。

sentences.english: He supposed one of them announced the visit of the Manchu.
sentences.chinese: 他估量其中有一张是通知那位满清大员莅临的消息。

sentences.english: The welcome general customers visit the instruction wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎广大客户莅临指导。

sentences.english: Free attendance for this event. We're expecting your presence.
sentences.chinese: 本次活动参加免费，我们恭迎您的莅临。

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome all to visit our company and do business with us.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎海内外客商莅临参观指导及洽谈业务。

sentences.english: First of all, I wish to extend a warm Hong Kong welcome to all of you.
sentences.chinese: 首先，热烈欢迎各位莅临香港。

sentences.english: We sincerely wish to provide excellent service to customers. The suggestion and guidance of people of all circles are cordially welcome.
sentences.chinese: 本公司竭诚为广大用户服务，欢迎各界人士莅临指导。

sentences.english: Welcome fellow masters to visit the instruction.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位高手莅临指导。

sentences.english: Welcome to Hotspring Gras the well as the Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 接待您莅临温泉大旅店。

sentences.english: So thanks to all of you for taking the time to be here this evening.
sentences.chinese: 感谢大家今晚拨冗莅临。

definition: (of a notable person etc) to honor with one's presence and offer guidance (idiom)
to go in person
to get together all at once
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to be present at a meeting
to find time to do sth in the midst of pressing affairs
pageant/distinguished meeting
to grace sb with one's presence/your arrival (honorific)/your esteemed presence
to pay a visit
to congregate in one hall (idiom); to gather under one roof
special invitation
to participate in a meeting
joint participation/to go together
to look forward to sth/to wait respectfully
to visit/to pay a visit
(formal) to honor with one's presence/to attend
